summary: kluster.ai provides the technology to verify and trust AI responses in real time. Developers can validate outputs, detect hallucinations, and ensure response reliability across any model, with minimal integration effort.

source_repos.name: kluster.ai cookbook
source_repos.description: This repository is a collection of guides and examples designed to help developers unlock the full potential of kluster.ai.

source_repos.name: Verify Guardrail Validator
source_repos.description: This validator detects hallucinations in AI-generated content using kluster.ai's Verify API. The service can evaluate the AI response based on a given context, which makes it great for RAG applications. Without providing a specific context, the service can also be used as a real-time reliability verification service. Verify is able to identify when AI responses contain fabricated or inaccurate information.

source_repos.name: Self-hosted MCP
source_repos.description: kluster.ai's HTTP Streamable MCP self-hosted server. Deploy locally with two powerful tools: verify for fact-checking a prompt from a user and response from the agent, and verify_document for document validation.

optional_resources.title: kluster.ai Cloud MCP
optional_resources.description: The kluster.ai Cloud MCP is a managed service that provides instant setup without deployment.
